verbose_text: Dan Li et al. demonstrated that bufalin induced MGC803 cell apoptosis through increasing the Bax / Bcl-2 ratio, activation of caspase-3 and inhibition of phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase (PI3K)/Akt signaling pathway; and a combination of bufalin and LY294002, a PI3K specific inhibitor, enhanced apoptosis.
evidence: Li et al. demonstrated that bufalin induced MGC803 cell apoptosis through increasing the Bax
